text: Stiff Upper Lip is the fourteenth studio album by Australian hard rock band AC/DC. The album was released on February 28, 2000. It was the group's first studio album of new material in 5 years. == Track listing == # "Stiff Upper Lip" 3:34 # "Meltdown" 3:41 # "House of Jazz" 3:56 # "Hold Me Back" 3:59 # "Safe in New York City" 3:59 # "Can't Stand Still" 3:41 # "Can't Stop Rock 'n' Roll" 4:02 # "Satellite Blues" 3:46 # "Damned" 3:52 # "Come and Get It" 4:02 # "All Screwed Up" 4:36 # "Give It Up" 3:54 == References == Category:2000 albums Category:Elektra Records albums Category:AC/DC albums
title: Stiff Upper Lip (album)
